name: VR Neusea lab
description:
Students project for oculus quest 2 based around idea of modifying users perspective. App needs to be sideloaded.

Available modifiers:

  • Upside down view,
  • Broken eye,
  • Dizzy simulation,
  • Out of body experience

Touch one of metal spheres to choose modifier and touch black button to start test. Test is in a form of Simon says game played two times, with and without modifier.

Creators:

  • Patryk Utkała
  • Ania Butowska
